STOP OAK MEADOW PLAZA & SOUTH-EAST QUADRANT DEVELOPMENT

Protect Viewshed and Agricultural Land in Morgan Hill

About Us

The Save Morgan Hill Organization is a movement started by the residents of Morgan Hill who are focused on responsibly growing the City of Morgan Hill. We are not anti-growth, we are pro-Smart growth.

We represent hundreds of Morgan Hill residents who want to take action against the assault on the rural character of our community. Such as recent City proposals to needlessly pave over farmland and open spaces to replace them with gas stations, fast food restaurants and commercial retail space. This type of urban sprawl would have added additional expense for the taxpayers and further contributed to traffic congestion.

The Save Morgan Hill members took action by gathering petition signatures in opposition to the urban sprawl proposal. We also attended numerous City planning and City counsel meetings to voice our concerns.

The Save Morgan Hill members were successful in preserving some of scenic hillsides, wildlife habitat and farmlands. However, the work continues to achieve a smart and balanced growth plan for Morgan Hill. We need your help.

  • 1411

    Supporters

How Can I get involved?

Membership in the Save Morgan Hill Organization is open to any citizen of Morgan Hill who supports Smart growth. By registering on the website, staying current with City planning proposals and attending critical City Counsel meetings, you can ensure a stake in the long-term viability of Morgan Hill’s growth plan.

Who can I contact to learn more?

The Organization’s governing board consists of the following members:

President: Kevin Pfeil
Vice President: Aleks Vranicic
Treasurer: Sherril Nathan
Communications Consultant: Yvette Castanon
